metadata.synopsis: Player characters are commenting on skeletons in a chapel. Even though the corpses look like they are scribes, they are all armed.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Armed scribes - but no sign of a struggle.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I wonder what was so subversive about their words that they commanded protection.
1.context: NodeContext: player reacts to companion commenting that skeletons in an abandoned chapel appear to have died without a fight. Slightly unnerved
